com.camerontec.catalys.util.logger

Class LoggerContextHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.logger.LoggerContextHelper

  • public class LoggerContextHelper
extends Object
    Helper for adapters/message processors to update Context information.

    This updates ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_ID and an ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_COUNT as context information.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoggerContextHelper

        public LoggerContextHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • initLoggerContext

        public static void initLoggerContext(IFIXMessage message)
        Initialize the logger context for internal message tracking purposes.

        The default implementation first checks to see whether an ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_ID is present. If present this method does nothing, else it inserts both a ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_ID and an ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_COUNT into the message and updates the thread local logging context.

        There is a small performance penalty associated with this processing. Subclasses may override and disable if that penalty is not wanted.

        Parameters:
        message - The FIX message.

      • updateLoggerContext

        public static void updateLoggerContext(IFIXMessage message)
        Update the logger context with context data from message for internal message tracking purposes.

        Implementation retrieves both a ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_ID and an ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_COUNT from given message and inserts into the thread local logging context.

        Parameters:
        message - The FIX message.

      • clearLoggerContext

        public static void clearLoggerContext()
        Clears context data from Thread Local Logger Context.

        Removes both a ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_ID and an ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_COUNT from the thread local logging context.

      • updateLoggerContext

        public static void updateLoggerContext()
        Initialize the logger context for internal message tracking purposes.

        The default implementation inserts new values for both a ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_ID and an ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_COUNT into the thread local logging context.

      • updateMessageContextData

        public static void updateMessageContextData(IFIXMessage message)
        Update the message with context data from Local Thread Context.

        The default implementation first checks to see whether an ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_ID is present in message. If present this method does nothing, else it inserts both a ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_ID and an ILoggerContext.ORIGINATOR_COUNT into the message taking values from thread local logging context.

        Parameters:
        message - The FIX message.
